item.title: MIUI V13.0.3.0.SKFEUXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 10 Pro EEA
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 10 Pro EEA

Codename: sweet

Version: V13.0.3.0.SKFEUXM | 12.0

Size: 5.9 GB

MD5: 7d013f0d1d0de2e4916d02ca06cd9d97

Changelog:
[System]
Stable MIUI based on Android 12
Updated Android Security Patch to December 2021. Increased system security.
[Lock screen]
Fix: Home screen froze when the screen turned on and off rapidly
Fix: UI items overlapped after switching resolution
Fix: Wallpaper Carousel buttons didn't always work
[More features and improvements]
New: Apps can be opened as floating windows directly from the sidebar
Optimization: Enhanced accessibility support for Phone, Clock, and Weather
Optimization: Mind map nodes are more convenient and intuitive now

Download: Here
